Uses of Interface
gridAutomaton.Rule

  • Packages that use Rule 
    Package Description
    gridAutomaton  

    • Uses of Rule in gridAutomaton

      Classes in gridAutomaton that implement Rule 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DeathRule
      Rules to match for a live cell to stay alive on to the next generation, otherwise it dies.
      class  GoldenRule
      This rule is effective when a cell has exactly two states.
      class  LifeRule
      Rule to match to make a dead cell becoming a live cell either way, it stays dead on to the next generation.
      Methods in gridAutomaton that return types with arguments of type Rule 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Rule> SquareGrid.getRules()
      Returns the rules.
      Method parameters in gridAutomaton with type arguments of type Rule 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SquareGrid.setRules(java.util.List<Rule> rules)
      Sets the rules.
      Constructor parameters in gridAutomaton with type arguments of type Rule 
      Constructor and Description

      Constructs a new object SquareGrid.
